tool_description: This tool provides information about plants grown for agricultural purposes in Spain, including details on taxonomy, growing periods, fruit types, and categorization. It encompasses a total of 293 species and allows filtering based on various characteristics.

api_list.name: Crops list
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all crops that are grown in Spain, with the ability to filter results through optional query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: family
optional_parameters.description: The family classification of the crop.

optional_parameters.name: commonName
optional_parameters.description: The common name of the crop.

optional_parameters.name: specieName
optional_parameters.description: The scientific name of the species.

optional_parameters.name: consistency
optional_parameters.description: The consistency of the crop (e.g., herbaceous).

optional_parameters.name: cropCycle
optional_parameters.description: The growth cycle of the crop (e.g., annual).

optional_parameters.name: fruitType
optional_parameters.description: The type of fruit produced by the crop.
